section.para: Project to count german license plates on pictures. The data set should contain pictures that vary in quality, weather, light conditions, etc..

listitem.para:
Image Preprocessing
Opening
Greyscaling
Bluring
Thresholding
Iterate over each contour based on aspect ratio, min height and width + remove any unnessecary contours
Pictures with an angle that is too large. The license plate is no longer recognised as a rectangle but a paralelogram.
License Plates that are to far away
Labeln -> Datensatz a. ID b. Konditionen (Beschreibung) c. Helligkeit d. Kontrast e. SÃ¤ttigung f. Wie viele Nummernschilder g. Wie viele Buchstaben
